text: Siliqua (Silìcua) is a town and comune (municipality) in the Province of Sud Sardegna in Sardinia, Italy. As of 2016, 3,872 people lived there. Its area is 189.85 km².Istituto nazionale di statistica - Superficie territoriale per zona altimetrica It is 66 meters above sea level. == References == == Other websites == Category:Communes of the Province of South Sardinia
title: Siliqua, Sardinia
